item.title: Watch ‘Guris Guiris’, the last madness of my young brother
item.description: I know this post has nothing to do with technology, except that my brother studied Electronic Engineering and later on decided to become a cinematographer directorâ€¦ He has just finished a set of short films with some friends. You can watch them in Guris Guiris Very funny indeed.
